original_title: Escape to Nature: Vol. 2: Underwater Peace
overview: This second soothing volume in the Escape to Nature series takes you below the ocean's surface to bask in a series of calming waters amid thriving wildlife of the marine world.  Designed to help the viewer reach a peaceful state of mind and prepare the body and soul for relaxation, the program blends a soothing soundtrack of ambient music with a rotating display of breathtaking aquatic imagery.
title: Escape to Nature: Vol. 2: Underwater Peace
